high_descs: Turn around and walk to the right side of the toilet.
Pick up the purple spray bottle on the toilet tank.
Place the spray bottle in the trash bin to the left of the toilet paper.
anns.task_desc: Place a spray bottle in a trash bin.

high_descs: Turn around and find the toilet.
Pick up the spray bottle from the back of the toilet.
Carry the spray bottle, and move a step to the right.
Place the spray bottle in the trash can.
anns.task_desc: Move a spray bottle to the trash can.

high_descs: pick up the spray bottle that is on the back of the toilet
turn right, take two steps, turn left to face trash can
put spray bottle in trash can
anns.task_desc: move spray bottle from back of toilet to trash can
